posts.postText:
This new one sucks. I reset it to old one and it no longer functions properly. There are lines of code at the top of every page "// 0) { if (base_url.indexOf(''?'') == -1) { document.location.href = base_url + ''?start='' + ((page - 1) * per_page); } else { document.location.href = base_url.replace(/&/g, ''&'') + ''&start='' + ((page - 1) * per_page); } } } /** * Find a member */ function find_username(url) { popup(url, 760, 570, ''_usersearch''); return false; } /** * Mark/unmark checklist * id = ID of parent container, name = name prefix, state = state [true/false] */ function marklist(id, name, state) { var parent = document.getElementById(id); if (!parent) { eval(''parent = document.'' + id); } if (!parent) { return; } var rb = parent.getElementsByTagName('input''); for (var r = 0; r < rb.length; r++) { if (rb[r].name.substr(0, name.length) == name) { rb[r].checked = state; } } } // ]]>"

And the front page chatbox no worky
God I wished the shoutbox worked...
Please don't post meaningless posts on threads that aren't in the spambox. (Posts deleted.)

I fail to see how that was a meaningless post, I made the themes I find it offensive.

I find this offensive.
I like the new style . Only thing we need is a chatbox, the chatbox is so important.

>> I fail to see how that was a meaningless post, I made the themes I find it offensive.

I find this offensive. 

This error doesn't have to do with the themes.

>> This new one sucks. 

It isn't only about the error

Thank you Balenti.

I don't understand why people complain about user info on right, around here we read from left to right. We get to message quicker, once all of us get used to it, I'm sure we will all like it. For those who deny this, I messaged the original author to see if there is any way to switch the info to the opposite side.
I dont care about where my user info is.. me wanty shout bawks
Most of us do as well Nixon, and welcome back dude :D

I don't know about you guys, but I am lovin'' bobnnjg,  not  made by Bob Doyle

I don't think many people have a problem with the themes, just that the chat box is gone D:
